events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but want to return it because the size does not fit me and I would like a refund.
The issue has been classified under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to size issues.
Support agent Jenna has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 4589210. The jacket is brand new and still has all the tags attached, I haven't worn it at all.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process as soon as we receive the returned item. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That's great, thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
